column1: Itza_POS_1_1: Our tour guide Jesus and Juan Pablo were amazing they gave us a lot of background and the experience was once in a lifetime the swim in the Cenote was awesome definitely bring water shoes and do the jump what a feeling only thing I would change is empty out the bathroom from the bus while we are seeing the temple at the end it was bad
Itza_POS_2_1: Must do as early morning trip
Itza_POS_2_2:  We left hotel at 5am and got there before the crowds and the heat
Itza_POS_2_3:  Incredible place with so many stories
Itza_POS_2_4:  Our guide was fantastic and showed us so many unique things from clapping in front of the temple to whispering on the wind and being heard 200 metres away
Itza_POS_2_5:  The history of the place is amazing and there is plenty of bird and animal life around
Itza_POS_2_6:  Plenty to see and take in
Itza_POS_2_7:  We left around midday and it was getting REAL hot !
